summary: Steinthorr is a former Imperial soldier who has taken to encamping himself on the ridge just opposite of the Imperial Camp in the Pale Hold of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Steinthorr is honorable, stern, and at times very outspoken on his view of the civil war that is going on in Skyrim. He is in all senses of the term a nord imperial soldier. His hatred of the Thalmor, and those allied with them will become apparent within a short time-frame. 
 This mod is to add this former Imperial soldier as a dynamic follower to the game. 
Additionally, I did voice this character myself with a quality microphone, and the recording software in the CreationKit.   
 Note: This is only v.1.0, and in future updates more content will be added including, but not limited to: Steinthorr\'s brother, who is a guard in Whiterun. 
== Little fact about the name Steinthorr: It is a conjunctive of the two names Stein (stone) and Thor (thunder) in the Norwegian tongue. ==
 Lastly, please give any feedback that will be helpful in making this NPC/Follower mod the best it can be.
author: Dionysus10
